about_the_game:
Porn Empire is an adult business management game with light RPG elements. Start as a small time porn producer and build your empire.

  • Create your own character and choose to play as either a male or female protagonist!
  • Level up and try to persuade increasingly prestigious models to join your team.
  • Manage your porn studio. Starting with amateur shoots and advancing to automated multi-studio productions.
  • Explore side ventures such as camshows, photo modeling, nightclubs, and more.
  • Manage your models. Train, keep them happy, secure with contract.
  • Oversee your company by hiring and managing staff, setting policies, establishing a network of websites, and striving to outperform your rivals.
  • Build and upgrade you own mansion to reflect your success.

content_descriptors.notes:
There are explicit sexual acts including penetrative sex. There is no sexual violence or non-consensual sex, or anything that goes against Steam rules.

Violence is only implied not shown and against drunks in the bar, not against your models.

There is use of drugs for happiness increase of  performance.

Porn Empire is an adult business management game with light RPG elements. Start as a small time porn producer and build your empire.

  • Create your own character and choose to play as either a male or female protagonist!
  • Level up and try to persuade increasingly prestigious models to join your team.
  • Manage your porn studio. Starting with amateur shoots and advancing to automated multi-studio productions.
  • Explore side ventures such as camshows, photo modeling, nightclubs, and more.
  • Manage your models. Train, keep them happy, secure with contract.
  • Oversee your company by hiring and managing staff, setting policies, establishing a network of websites, and striving to outperform your rivals.
  • Build and upgrade you own mansion to reflect your success.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500, AMD Radeon R5

name: Porn Empire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500, AMD Radeon R5
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
